input_email_body:
Subject: 

A potential data breach impacting medical data security has been identified. This could be due to weak access controls and outdated software You can reach me at fatima.farsi@help.com.. Actions taken include updating antivirus definitions, tightening user permissions, and assessing system logs for any suspicious activity My name is Fatima Al-Farsi.. We are taking this incident seriously and are working to resolve it promptly.
